subscription_alternative.monthly_limit: Usage caps on GPT-4o apply during peak hours (e.g., up to 80 messages every 3 hours).
5x higher usage limits than the free tier, with a higher capacity for processing complex documents.

pricing_analysis.subscription_adoption_rate: High (estimated 15-20% of active ChatGPT/Claude users opt for paid tiers)
pricing_analysis.trend: Aggressive price compression for flagship models, with a new focus on small, high-volume, low-cost models (e.g., GPT-4o mini, Claude 3 Haiku). Subscriptions are evolving from simple access to value-added bundles including higher limits, advanced tools, and multi-modal features. Enterprise pricing is increasingly differentiated by security, fine-tuning, and support rather than just volume discounts.
